content.rendered: The T-bone steaks come from the lumbar vertebra with areas of the stomach. Making this steaks you need a T shaped bone meat.To prepare T bone steaks this meat must be dry and you need soy sauce, garlic, olive oil, butter, honey etc.take all ingredients in a bowl and mix and divide them in three.Before 30 minute marinate the meat.After that you just need to fry the meat for some period of time.After frying you can serve it with garlic, sauce.

excerpt.rendered: T-bone steaks are e beef cut from the short loin.We process this type of meat in a very specific way. So that the quality of this type of meat can not be rotten and it looks fresh and must ensure that its shape is T.Since it is a high quality product.
